Email_Provider_Description: Select your email service provider for authentication
Google_OAuth_Client_ID_Description: OAuth client ID for Google authentication (Gmail only)
Google_OAuth_Client_Secret_Description: OAuth client secret for Google authentication (Gmail only)
OAuth_Redirect_URI_Description: OAuth redirect URI - should end with /api/apps/public/[app-id]/oauth-callback
Outlook_OAuth_Client_ID_Description: OAuth client ID for Microsoft authentication (Outlook only)
Outlook_OAuth_Client_Secret_Description: OAuth client secret for Microsoft authentication (Outlook only)
Outlook_OAuth_Redirect_URI_Description: OAuth redirect URI for Outlook - should end with /api/apps/public/[app-id]/outlook-oauth-callback
Email_Command_Params: login, logout, config, llm-config, help, stats
Email_Command_Description: Connect and manage your email account integration with AI assistance.
Connected_Account_Message: You have successfully connected your __provider__ account:
Try_Again_Message: Please try again or contact your administrator.
Features_Available_Message: You can now use EmailBridge NLP features in Rocket.Chat!
Safe_To_Close_Message: You can safely close this window and return to Rocket.Chat.
OAuth_Connection_Success: Successfully connected to your email account!
OAuth_Connection_Failed: Failed to connect to your email account. Please try again.
Email_Not_Connected: No email account connected. Please connect your account first.
Invalid_Email_Provider: Invalid email provider selected. Please check your settings.
Authentication_Required: Authentication required. Please connect your email account.
Connection_Status_Connected: ‚úÖ Email account is connected and ready to use.
Disconnect_Failed: Failed to disconnect your email account.
Already_Logged_In:
‚úÖ You are already logged in with **__provider__** as **__email__**.

If you want to logout, use `/email logout`.
Outlook_Available:
‚úÖ **Outlook authentication is now available!**

You can use both **Gmail** and **Outlook** for email authentication.
Provider_Not_Implemented:
‚ùå **__provider__ authentication is not yet implemented.**

Currently **Gmail** and **Outlook** are supported for authentication.
Connect_Account_Message:
üîê **Connect your __provider__ account to Rocket Chat**
If want to use Outlook account, please change the Email Provider from settings.
Not_Authenticated: ‚ùå You are not currently authenticated with __provider__. Use `/email login` to login.
Logout_Confirmation:
üîì **Logout Confirmation**

Are you sure you want to logout from **__provider__** account **__email__**?
Provider_Not_Supported_Logout:
‚ùå **__provider__ is not supported for logout.**

Please contact your administrator for assistance.
Logout_Success:
‚úÖ **Successfully logged out from your __provider__ account.**

You can now login with a different account if needed.
Logout_Failed:
‚ùå **Failed to logout from your email account.**

Please try again or contact your administrator.
Logout_Error:
‚ùå **Error occurred during logout process:**
__error__

Please try again or contact your administrator.
Helper_Greeting: Hey __name__! I'm Email Bot üëã. Here are some quick tips to get you started!
Help_Command: use `/email help` - Show this help message
Login_Command: use `/email login` - Login to your email account
Logout_Command: use `/email logout` - Logout from your email account
Config_Command: use `/email config` - Open user preferences and settings
Default_Greeting: Hey __name__! I'm Email Bot üëã. I can help you all your email needs.
Use_Help_Command: Use `/email help` to learn about all available features and commands.
Outlook_OAuth_Settings_Missing: Missing required Outlook OAuth settings. Please configure the Outlook OAuth settings in the app configuration.
Outlook_OAuth_Init_Failed: Failed to initialize Outlook OAuth Service
Outlook_OAuth_Token_Exchange_Failed: Failed to exchange code for tokens
Outlook_OAuth_No_Access_Token: No access token received from OAuth provider
Outlook_OAuth_User_Email_Failed: Failed to get user email from Microsoft
Outlook_OAuth_No_Refresh_Token: No access token received when refreshing
OAuth_Redirect_URI_Mismatch: Redirect URI mismatch. Please ensure your Azure app registration includes the exact URI
OAuth_SSL_Error: SSL/TLS Protocol Error. For localhost development, ensure Azure app registration includes HTTP (not HTTPS) redirect URI. Check your redirect URI configuration in Azure Portal.
OAuth_Try_Again: Please try again or contact your administrator.
OAuth_Successfully_Connected: You have successfully connected your __provider__ account:
OAuth_Features_Available: You can now use EmailBridge NLP features in Rocket.Chat!
OAuth_Safe_To_Close: You can safely close this window and return to Rocket.Chat.
OAuth_Azure_HTTP_URI: In Azure Portal, add redirect URI with http:// (not https) for localhost
OAuth_Azure_Both_Versions: Make sure both HTTP and HTTPS versions are registered if needed
OAuth_Verify_Settings: Verify your Outlook OAuth settings in Rocket.Chat match exactly
Config_No_Trigger: ‚ùå Unable to open configuration modal. Please try again.
Config_Modal_Error: ‚ùå Error opening configuration modal. Please try again.
LLM_Provider_Description: Select the AI language model provider to use for processing email commands
SelfHosted_LLM_URL_Description: URL for your self-hosted LLM endpoint
OpenAI_API_Key_Description: Your OpenAI API key for accessing GPT models (required only when using OpenAI provider)
Gemini_API_Key_Description: Your Google AI Studio API key for accessing Gemini models (required only when using Gemini provider)
Groq_API_Key_Description: Your Groq API key for accessing Llama models (required only when using Groq provider)
Max_Recipients_Per_Email_Description: Maximum number of recipients allowed per email for all users (default: 100)
